description: I should be able to create, change, and share a note

elements.name: Make and save and change a note

steps.name: Wait 1 seconds between steps
the account named "foo<script>alert(1)</script>{{2+2}}" with password "foo"
I login as "foo<script>alert(1)</script>{{2+2}}" with password "foo"
I should see the "allNotesTitle" element
I click on "newNote"
I should see the "notetitle" element
I should see the "notebody" element
I clear and fill in "notetitle" with "hello this is my note title<script>alert(1)</script>"
I clear and fill in "notebody" with "hello this is my note body!"
I click on "saveButton"
I should see the "notetitle" element containing "hello this is my note title"

steps.name: I should see the "notebody" element containing "hello this is my note body!"
I click on "allNotes"
I should see the "allNotesTitle" element
I should see 1 note on the notes page
I click on the link with the text "hello this is my note title"
I should see the "notetitle" element containing "hello this is my note title"
I should see the "notebody" element containing "hello this is my note body!"

steps.name: Wait 1 seconds between steps
the account named "alice" with password "alice"
the account named "bob" with password "bob"
I login as "alice" with password "alice"
I click on "newNote"
I should see the "notebody" element
I should see the name "alice" up top
I clear and fill in "notetitle" with "hello this is my note title"
I clear and fill in "notebody" with "hello this is my note body!"
I click on "saveButton"
I should see the "notebody" element containing "hello this is my note body!"
I clear and fill in "share" with "bob"
I click on "shareButton"
I should see the "shareresult" element containing "bob"
I login as "bob" with password "bob"
I should see 1 note on the notes page
I should see the name "bob" up top
I click on the link with the text "hello this is my note title"
I should see the name "bob" up top
I should see the "notetitle" element containing "hello this is my note title"
I should see the "notebody" element containing "hello this is my note body!"

name: Notes UI
